ing: 1/2 Granny Smith apple, cored and chopped
des: "This salad is a treat for all the senses. I like it best with this lemony vinaigrette, but a light creamy dressing works well, too."
ins:
Place the vinegar, lemonade, lemon juice, peanut oil, honey, salt, pepper, celery seed, and hot sauce in a blender. Puree until blended, then set aside for 30 minutes.
Place the romaine lettuce, green onions, green pepper, cucumber, peas, celery, apple, grapes, and blue cheese in a large bowl. Pour in the salad dressing and toss to coat.
